name: .VFT File Extension
summary: Learn about .VFT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A VFT file is a video filter used by VideoStudio, a video-editing application developed by Corel (developed formerly by Ulead). It stores settings for an effect that modifies the look of a video, including effects such as cartoonizers and black and white color. VideoStudio no longer supports VFT files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
